Stran.title: Stran
Stran.description: You are a [color=#bf9f40]Strani[/color] wanderer, guarded at all times by a loyal [color=#bf9f40]Tugar[/color].
Stran.brief: A wanderer of the eastern desert. Guarded by a loyal wooly beast.
Stran.name: [color=#bf9f40]Stran[/color]

Naqui.title: Naqui
Naqui.description: You are a [color=#309fbf]Naqui[/color], a sacred fighter of the mountain temples. You protect yourself with a continuous ritual of martial glorification.
Naqui.brief: A citizen of the mountain temple-lands. Practices an empowering ritual of attunement.
Naqui.name: [color=#309fbf]Naqui[/color]

Albaz.title: Albaz
Albaz.description: You are an [color=#30bf30]Albazi[/color] of the northern ice caves. You frequently purify yourself with a sacred, acrobatic dance.
Albaz.brief: A nigh-immortal denizen of the northern ice caves. Amplifies healing with tattooed charms.
Albaz.name: [color=#30bf30]Albaz[/color]

Lochra.title: Lochra
Lochra.description: You are a [color=#ff5020]Lochra[/color], a wild-man of the mountains and river valleys.
Lochra.brief: A brutish exile of the inland forests. Can awaken the feared Berserkergang.
Lochra.name: [color=#ff5020]Lochra[/color]

Kull.title: Kull
Kull.description: You are a [color=#7f206f]Kull[/color] of the ancient pits. Your body is magic, and poison is your friend.
Kull.brief: An elusive scout from the underground tunnel-halls. Performs wild evasive movements.
Kull.name: [color=#7f206f]Kull[/color]

Alhaja.title: Alhaja
Alhaja.brief: A traveler from the desert of the gods. Can smite enemies through prayer.
Alhaja.name: [color=#a090b0]Alhaja[/color]

Tengu.title: Tengu
Tengu.brief: An arrogant fighter cursed with a frail animal form. Attuned to lightning.
Tengu.name: [color=#509070]Tengu[/color]

Qamar.title: Qamar
Qamar.brief: A star-dancer from the Astral wall.
Qamar.name: [color=#a050af]Qamar[/color]

Skeleton.title: Skeleton
Skeleton.brief: An undead pile of bones. Resists many types of harm.
Skeleton.name: [color=#a0a000]Skeleton[/color]

Arba.title: Arba
Arba.brief: A mysterious plant-folk. Relentlessly produces friendly Vinespawns.
Arba.name: [color=#209f50]Arba[/color]

Volkite.title: Volkite
Volkite.brief: An ancient being risen from molten rock. Grows more powerful through increased encumbrance.
Volkite.name: [color=#ff7000]Volkite[/color]

Ihra.title: Ihra
Ihra.brief: A powerful divine spirit. Weighed down by lifeforce.
Ihra.name: [color=#60a0d0]Ihra[/color]
